Snore-O-Vision: A virtual reality app that simulates the experience of being inside a sun, complete with the ability to feel the heat and vibrations of the sun's snores.
Sun-Snooze: A line of sun-shaped pillows that vibrate and glow to help you sleep through the sun's snores.
Snore-Away: A portable soundproofing device that fits around the sun and absorbs its snores, allowing you to enjoy a peaceful night's sleep.
Sun-Snooze: A subscription service that delivers a new, unique sun-shaped pillow to your doorstep every month, each one designed to help you sleep through a different type of snore.
Snore-O-Matic: A smartphone app that uses AI to analyze the sun's snores and generate a personalized soundtrack to help you sleep through them.
